title: Stream: Porcelain Raft – Strange Weekend
body:
After a host of mightily impressive EP’s, Brooklyn based **Porcelain Raft** is set to release his debut long player, _**Strange Weekend**_ via **Secretly Canadian**.

Out on 23 January, it’s a wonderfully entrancing record, traversing the warm, languid slopes of idyllic dream-pop and emotionally fraught songwriting. Documenting the travels of **Mauro Remiddi**, it’s a stirringly personal listen, with each track letting slip just a little more of his epic journey through life. Stream the entirety of _**Strange Weekend**_ below and pre-order [here](http://www.scdistribution.com/cat/scd_catalog.php?usersearch=Porcelain+Raft&pagerequest).

via [Hypem](http://hypem.com/artist/Porcelain%20Raft)
